title: Dying Fears Joke
content: Adam woke up suddenly, sweating all over.  ”What’s the problem”, asked his wife.  ”Are you OK?”   “I just dreamed that I died!”  responded a shaken Adam.  ”And it was so bad up there, and that’s why you’re sweating all over?”  asked his wife.  ”You bet!”  exclaimed Adam.  ”I got up there, and was right in front of G-d himself, when he suddenly sneezed…..and I didn’t know what to say to him!  Whoa was that traumatic!”
